mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (id, user_name, password, login_name, time, province_code, city_code, county_coude, remark, phone) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCoude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update tb_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_coude = #{countyCoude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county_coude = #{countyCoude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(id) from tb_user where
